main event: An entire battalion at Ft. Sill, Oklahoma, observed an unidentified flying object on 18 Sep 60.
interesting points: The sighting occurred during reveille formation with all troops participating., The object was detected by radar but not visible to the naked eye., The sighting was not considered characteristic of a meteor or normal astronomical phenomena., The altitude was estimated at 6000 - 7000 feet with clear skies at the time., Sgt. Spence, who reported the sighting, had significant experience in missile operations.
witness description: entire battalion of troops in formation
